Package main.java.view

Class TextView

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.view.TextView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IView
    public class TextView
extends java.lang.Object
implements IView
    This class represents implementation of the IView interface. The implementation focuses on how to display the inputs processed by Model and passed by Controller to the user.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      TextView​(java.io.PrintStream out)
      Constructs a TextView object which can be used by the controller to give the outputs to display.

    • Method Summary

      This method displays the portfolio composition to the user in a text formatted output.

        public void createPortfolioTable​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> listOfPortfolio)

        Specified by:
        createPortfolioTable in interface IView
        Parameters:

      • getPortfolioComposition

        public void getPortfolioComposition​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> listOfStocks)
        This method displays the portfolio composition to the user in a text formatted output.
        Specified by:
        getPortfolioComposition in interface IView
        Parameters:
        listOfStocks - list of strings, where each string represent the stock information like symbol, Quantity, name etc.

      • showStockResponseWrapper

        public void showStockResponseWrapper​(StockPriceResponseWrapper response,
                                     java.time.LocalDate inputDate)
        This method displays the portfolio value in a text formatted output.
        Specified by:
        showStockResponseWrapper in interface IView
        Parameters:
        response - StockPriceResponseWrapper object which internally has successList consisting of portfolio stocks and its value at a currentDate...along with it failure stocks for which price retrieval failed
        inputDate - Date for which the portfolio is being displayed.

      • displayGraph

        public void displayGraph​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> graphOutput)
        This method displays the graph output.

        It receives three inputs: 1. Scale of the time 2. The normalized price 3. The actual price that needs to be displayed

        .
        Specified by:
        displayGraph in interface IView
        Parameters:
        graphOutput - list of strings wherein each string in the list has the following information 1. Scale of the time 2. The normalized price 3. The actual price that needs to be displayed
